svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Political participation measures the share of the adult population who voted in previous elections. It is one of the
component's of Vanhanen's Index of Democracy, alongside political competition.
